description: This file is a build script for the xupnp component, defining environment setup, build commands, and argument parsing for building, cleaning, configuring, installing, and rebuilding the component.

methods.name: configure
methods.description: Sets up configuration environment, calls the external script for configuration.

methods.name: clean
methods.description: Cleans build artifacts using external script.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the project, either using make directly for legacy or external scripts.

methods.name: rebuild
methods.description: Rebuilds the project, cleaning first if necessary.

methods.name: install
methods.description: Installs build artifacts to the filesystem, copying shared libraries and binaries, and configuration files.
